text: jin logon ne apane paalanahaar kee baat maan lee, unheen ke lie bhalaee hai aur jinhonne nahin maanee, yadi jo kuchh dharatee mein hai, sab unaka ho jaaye aur usake saath usake samaan aur bhee, to ve use (allaah ke dand se bachane ke lie) arthadand ke roop mein de denge. unheen se kada haî€¼isaab liya jaayega tatha unaka sthaan narak hai aur vah bura rahane ka sthaan hai
